TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed XmlAttributeProperties extends System.Object

summary.span: 封装 的 XML 语言特定的特性。

span.span: Encapsulates the XML language-related attributes of a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类实现的附加的属性支持， ，并和。This class implements attached property support for , , and and . 这些属性通常仅由 WPF XAML 分析器实现[!INCLUDE[net_v30_short](~/includes/net-v30-short-md.md)]和[!INCLUDE[net_v35_short](~/includes/net-v35-short-md.md)]。These properties are generally only used by the WPF XAML parser implementation for [!INCLUDE[net_v30_short](~/includes/net-v30-short-md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[net_v35_short](~/includes/net-v35-short-md.md)]. 从 XAML 标记的实际用户附加代码属性调用不是主要的方案。Actual user code attached property calls from XAML markup is not the primary scenario. 属性将作为附加属性主要，以便通过所有可能的对象关系图的依赖项属性，属性可以更好地支持属性继承概念。The properties are implemented as attached properties primarily so that the properties can better support the property inheritance concept for dependency properties through all possible object graphs. 在这种情况下，这实际上是基础结构支持类。As such, this is really an infrastructure support class. 有关详细信息，请参阅[属性值继承](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/property-value-inheritance.md)。For more information, see [Property Value Inheritance](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/property-value-inheritance.md).

summary.span: 获取或设置一个附加属性值，该附加属性值存储供适用于 .NET Framework 3.0 和 .NET Framework 3.5 的 WPF XAML 分析器使用的 XML 命名空间映射。

span.span: Gets or sets an attached property value that stores XML namespace maps for use by the WPF XAML parser for .NET Framework 3.0 and .NET Framework 3.5.
